Package nz.ac.auckland.integration.testing.validator

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Validator
    An interface for validating responses or expectations
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HeadersValidator
    Provides a mechanism for validating headers for an expectation or response
    HttpErrorValidator
    For validating the response exception is as expected
    HttpErrorValidator.Builder  
    JsonValidator
    Provides a mechanism for retrieving JSON values from a file/URL/String and also validating the response from a target service.
    PlainTextValidator
    A simple mechanism for sending and comparing plain text values using the Java equals mechanism
    SoapFaultValidator
    A validator for ensuring a SOAP fault being returned - this will likely only work on SOAP 1.1.
    SoapFaultValidator.Builder  
    XmlValidator
    Provides a mechanism for retrieving XML values from a file/URL/String and also validating a response from a target service.
